properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 13 at 3:11PM EST until February 14 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Northern Indiana
properties.description:
* WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations of 2 to 4 inches are
expected, with the greatest totals in the northwest portions of
St. Joseph County, and the western portions of Cass County.
Elsewhere, expect 1 to 2 inches.

* WHERE...In Indiana, St. Joseph County. In Michigan, Cass
County.

* WHEN...Until 7 AM EST Friday.

* IMPACTS...The hazardous conditions will impact the evening
commute, and road conditions may still be hazardous for the
Friday morning commute.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Light to moderate lake effect snow will
continue into Friday morning. Falling temperatures will begin to
limit melting of the snow on roads starting this evening. Wind
chills overnight into early Friday morning will drop into the
single digits below zero.
properties.instruction:
Slow down and use caution while traveling. Dress properly for cold
temperatures if heading outside tonight or early Friday morning.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 AM EST FRIDAY
